<Text: The Macedonian Monument is on the campus of the United States Naval Academy, across the street from Mahan Hall, at the end of Stribling Walk.>
Triplets:<The Macedonian Monument
1:
--------------------
Text: Macedonian Monument:  The monument's sculpture is the figurehead of HMS "Macedonian", captured by Stephen Decatur and the American frigate "United States" in the opening days of the War of 1812.
